thread.title: Customer Christine Kilpatrick
thread.title_full: MyBariatricPantry.com reviewed by Customer Christine Kilpatrick

author: Customer Christine Kilpatrick
title: Customer Christine Kilpatrick
text: Didn't have the time to drive to the doctor's office to get supplements so I decided to give My Bariatric Pantry a try. I'm very impressed with how fast the order shipped and arrived to me!!! Tried some new snacks and will buy more of them. Customer service was top notch!!!
